attributes.action: Department of work and pension staff to be retrained to treat people like human beings and not be rude and disrespectful
attributes.additional_details: I am sure there are lots of people out there who have felt undermined and disgusted by the attitude of staff working for department of work and pensions. I cannot believe they are allowed to speak to vulnerable people the way they do. Please sign this to make sure they are re trained in a civilised way. I personally am absoloutely outraged by the way they are allowed to talk to people. Please help get this sorted

rejection.details: This amounts to correspondence on a personal issue.
